title: UN-BAN players banned for certain amount of time?
body: I was banned for TRYING A SCRIPT ONCE.. {{item:3070}}  I got instantly banned about a year ago WITH NO WARNING OR NOTICE. I have learnt my lesson and would like my account back - is Riots ruthless stance on this acceptable? Can a year ban qualify as a warning? I'd like to re-join the game I loved and positively contributed too..

replies.body:
If you read the Terms of Service it's made very clear that cheating/scripting/hacking or otherwise gaining an unfair advantage in game will result in a permanent suspension with no warnings.

As with any competitive online game, cheating is taken very seriously. You won't be getting your account back from a scripting ban.

It's sad, but why'd you even try to use a script. I've heard people have asked riot to showcase certain scripts on YouTube and riot gave them permission to do so. (custom game though)
Other than that I think no one should even try using scripts. 
And your account is probably long gone.

yeah if you got banned for cheating you should never get your account back. 

in fact i think riot should actually perm ban people totally from playing the game again if they have cheated. 

watch the use of scripts plummet if they did this.
